channel.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
channel.description:
How do you make a cheat client for any runescape private server, I will like to add noclip, scam trade, dupe items, invisibilty, become admin, open bank...
If I would make a cheat client i will like the noclip to be set on and off whenever I want, there will be a feature for that.
Is there any possability for a cheat client to be made?
I have a cheat client downloaded on my pc and it works great but it will not work properly on some runescape private servers or even login to the runescape private server. Also I had other ones but I just used one but right now I am using Webber's Cheat Client. I am not sure if it works great on any server but I will like to make my own.
Webber's Cheat Client wont work properly on runescape private servers or sometimes it will not login. I can not advertise so I would not show you the download link.
I do not now about how to make any programs or runescape private server cheat clients even games and I can tell that I do not now any way to make programs or games and anything else you have to do with programming.
I have used this cheat clients: Bomb's Cheat Client v1.0 Azn Cheat Client Version 4 Webber's Cheat Client v1
I do not about any new updates of this runescape private server cheat clients but I found a Azn Cheat Client modified version but I do not want to download it, I do not now anything about it which I can not tell you if the Azn Cheat Client modified version has a virus.
The feature listed for the cheat client which I wrote in the beginning do not have to be the same as the one I have to do, I want to now how to do one. :)

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“bodya7, post:20, topic:378230”][quote author=Pingu121 link=topic=474109.msg3470006#msg3470006 date=1295215020]
I still have no problem on keep posting and complaining, sorry
[/quote]
Lol if you want to do it then learn it your not making it really if somone is just teaching you step by step what a noob
"LEARN,GO TO SCHOOL!,LEARN TO PLAY RSPS THE REAL WAY.(BTW IF YOUR GONNA CHEAT ON RSPS U MIGHT ASWELL GO ON RUNESCAPE AND MAKE A MACRO OR MAKE A FREAKIN GLITCH)
:OR JUST PAY SOMEONE MONEY TO MAKE A COPY AND PASTE SESSION FOR A FAILURE.

[/quote]

true but no-one responsed in 2 months. Just let this die

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:17, topic:378230”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=474109.msg3469941#msg3469941 date=1295212782]

if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) { for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; } } } }

Theres the input string for noclip, congratulations you can now walk through walls

How do you put all this sources together with a client, I need the whole tutorial on how to complete this.

Take the client that you want to hack, decompile it, then you can start fooling around with the code (unless its obfuscated, then your kinda screwed). It is common sense really, although I don’ t see the point in hacking a private server client. The only reason would be if the owner lets you sell accounts, but even then you could just write Simba scripts to macro for you rather than hacking into the client.
[/quote]A Java deobfuscator would probably assist there ;)[/quote]

I doubt he knows anything about those tho.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers

The only reason would be if the owner lets you sell accounts, but even then you could just write Simba scripts to macro for you rather than hacking into the client.[/quote]A Java deobfuscator would probably assist there

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

This is the most pathetic topic I have seen in a long time.

No one wants to do anything for you, unless you pay them money.

So what are your options?

  1. Pay up some money
  2. Learn to program
  3. Play the game normally

But seriously, who the fuck uses a Cheat Client on RSPS?

:|, Wow

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

I totally agree with everybody who has posted here, this topic is absolutely pathetic.

  1. Private Servers are already kind of like cheating compared to real Runescape, so play them right.
  2. Cheat Clients are indeed blocked on any decent server.
  3. You are lazy.
  4. You are (by observation) not very good at private servers.
  5. Anybody who really wants the work done for them, pays for it.
  6. Anybody who is asking for help, doesn’t flame the people who post.
  7. Anybody who wants help and doesn’t want to pay, is willing to do some of the work.
  8. Your topic is wrong, it says “[HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers”
  9. Your topic should say: “[REQ]Make me a cheat client for free”
  10. Instead of changing your title, change your attitude.
  11. those who are unwilling to learn to make their own new cheat client, deserve the really old ones.
  12. L2Post
  13. L2Play
  14. L2notflame
  15. L2notajerk

Have the best of days everyone

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Nothing is really free, I guess if you want to add some cheats to a client or already open source cheat client you will have to learn. No one really has the time to do this for you. You may get somewhere if you where offering money. A lot of servers have cheat client protection to prevent kids like you cheating. Plus your ignorance will prevent anyone from wanting to help you. Also I wouldn’t go making threats as above.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]How to make a cheat client for runescape private servers
item.dc:creator: @Pingu121 Pingu121
item.description:
@Pingu121 wrote:

How do you make a cheat client for any runescape private server, I will like to add noclip, scam trade, dupe items, invisibilty, become admin, open bank…

If I would make a cheat client i will like the noclip to be set on and off whenever I want, there will be a feature for that.

Is there any possability for a cheat client to be made?

I have a cheat client downloaded on my pc and it works great but it will not work properly on some runescape private servers or even login to the runescape private server. Also I had other ones but I just used one but right now I am using Webber’s Cheat Client. I am not sure if it works great on any server but I will like to make my own.

Webber’s Cheat Client wont work properly on runescape private servers or sometimes it will not login. I can not advertise so I would not show you the download link.

I do not now about how to make any programs or runescape private server cheat clients even games and I can tell that I do not now any way to make programs or games and anything else you have to do with programming.

I have used this cheat clients:
Bomb’s Cheat Client v1.0
Azn Cheat Client Version 4
Webber’s Cheat Client v1

I do not about any new updates of this runescape private server cheat clients but I found a Azn Cheat Client modified version but I do not want to download it, I do not now anything about it which I can not tell you if the Azn Cheat Client modified version has a virus.

The feature listed for the cheat client which I wrote in the beginning do not have to be the same as the one I have to do, I want to now how to do one.

Read full topic
